info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:41PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG TONIGHT WITH SOME LOCALLY DENSE FOG... Fog, locally dense, will affect the region going into tonight and will linger into early Sunday morning. Visibilities will be decreasing to one half to 2 miles, with some locations down to 1/4 mile or less at times. There is a chance that areas especially along the coast could have a larger area of dense fog tonight into early Sunday morning. If driving, be prepared for variable and suddenly reduced visibilities. Proceed with extra caution, drive slowly and allow for extra space between vehicles. Also, use low beam headlights.
